xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: tmpl:expand-template
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: tmpl:expand-template($input as item(), $map as element()?) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description:
Expand the XML fragment given in $input and replace all occurrences of template parameters within text strings or attributes with the replacements given in parameter $map. Template parameters are delimited with double $: $$parameter$$.
The parameter map contains a mapping of template parameter names to values:
<parameters> <param name="param1" value="value1"/> </parameters>

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: tmpl:parse
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: tmpl:parse($str as xs:string, $parameters as element()?) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Helper function: recursively replace parameters in the given string.
